synopsis.text: On his twelfth school transfer due to his parents' work, Riku Aoba finds himself in the unconventional Tsumugino Private High School, where academic freedom is the norm and the student council's whims rule the day. Riku's ordinary high school expectations are shattered as he becomes the unwitting center of attention in the student council's latest event, leading to a chaotic chase around the school. To add to the complexity, Riku finds himself the object of affection for three of the school's most popular girls. With a student body sporting animal ears and eccentric teachers, Riku's new school life is anything but ordinary. Will he navigate the unpredictable challenges and romantic entanglements, or will the pressure prove too much to handle? Join Riku on his thrilling and unpredictable journey in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
